known_issues: Admin login/authentication still failing after deployment: users receive 'Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.'

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix backend admin authentication so that logging in with the configured admin credentials (email: fitting.point.official@gmail.com, password: Farhan@456) successfully grants admin privileges to the current caller and does not incorrectly fail with an invalid-credentials error.

Ensure the admin login UI continues to display the message "Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again." only when the backend indicates invalid credentials, and displays a non-credential-related error message for other backend failures.

projectName: Fix admin email/password login rejecting valid credentials
